RiskAssessment.description: This is a generalized task resource allowing assessment of risks - it is expected that the resource will be specialized to reflect specific risks, such as risks associated with a party, or with an order, etc.

place.description: The place for which the risk is assessed, this is optional input to the task

characteristic.description: Additional characteristics for which the risk might be assessed, optional input to the task

status.description: The status of the risk assessment, such as Succeeded, In Progress, Failed, output from the task

riskAssessmentResult.description: The result of the risk assessment, output from the task
